name: product_search
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool target_com_shopping_api.
Tool description: Realtime APIs support entire shopping flow on Target.com.
(Free trial enabled)

API description: Search for products in a store based on a keyword.

store_id.description: The ID of the store to search in.

keyword.description: The keyword to search for products.

offset.description: The starting point for the search results. Defaults to '0'.

count.description: The maximum number of products to return. Defaults to '25'.
